verses.roman:
prabhu paḍi' mūrchā yāya, śvāsa nāhi āra
ācambite uṭhe prabhu kariyā huṅkāra

synonyms: prabhu—the Lord; paḍi'-falling down; mūrchā yāya—became unconscious; śvāsa nāhi—there was no breathing; āra—and; ācambite—suddenly; uṭhe—stands up; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kariyā huṅkāra—making a loud sound.
translation: The Lord fell to the ground unconscious, not even breathing. Then suddenly He stood up, making a loud sound.
